title: How to Follow Someone on Instagram

steps.title: Open the Instagram app by tapping the icon on your phone.
steps.content: Open the Instagram app by tapping the icon on your phone. The icon looks like a camera and should say “Instagram” underneath it. [1] X Research source If prompted, select your Instagram account and log in.

steps.title: Open the search tab by tapping the magnifying glass at the bottom of the screen.
steps.content: Open the search tab by tapping the magnifying glass at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: In the search bar at the top of the screen, type the name of the person or organization you want to follow.
steps.content: In the search bar at the top of the screen, type the name of the person or organization you want to follow. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the name of the user you want to follow.
steps.content: Tap the name of the user you want to follow. If the user you’re looking for doesn’t show up, ask them what their Instagram username is. If you want to follow a celebrity or organization but can't find their account, try searching for their Instagram username on Google.

steps.title: Tap the "Follow" button at the top of the screen.
steps.content: Tap the "Follow" button at the top of the screen. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Follow additional users on Instagram from your Facebook friends and Contacts.
steps.content: Follow additional users on Instagram from your Facebook friends and Contacts. Select your profile by tapping the button shaped like a person at the bottom-right of the screen. Tap the “⋮” at the top right of the page to open more options. Under “Follow People,” tap “Facebook Friends” to follow users from your Facebook friends, and tap “Contacts” to follow users from your phone’s contact list.
